66868.name: 9.a.1 - Total official flows for infrastructure, by recipient
66868.datasetName: Total official international support (official development assistance plus other official flows) to infrastructure
66868.s_name: Total official international support (official development assistance plus other official flows) to infrastructure

source.name: Total official international support (official development assistance plus other official flows) to infrastructure
source.additionalInfo:
Definition: 
 
Gross disbursements of total ODA and other official flows from all donors in support of infrastructure. 
 
Comments and limitations: 
 
Data in the Creditor Reporting System are available from 1973.  However, the data coverage is 
considered complete since 1995 for commitments at an activity level and 2002 for disbursements. 
 

Data Availability 

 
On a recipient basis for all developing countries eligible for ODA.
